description.value:
Karkethzerethzerus can use its Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of Karkethzerethzerus's choice that is within 120 feet of Karkethzerethzerus and aware of him must succeed on a [[/save wis 21 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Karkethzerethzerus's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Karkethzerethzerus uses one of the following breath weapons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Karkethzerethzerus exhales a shadowy icy blast in a 90-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 24 format=long]], taking [[/damage 15d8 type=necrotic average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and an &Reference[undead]{undead} shadow rises from its corpse and acts immediately after Karkethzerethzerus in the initiative count. The shadow is under Karkethzerethzerus's control.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Karkethzerethzerus exhales paralyzing gas in a 90-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save con 24 format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Karkethzerethzerus magically polymorphs into a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} or &Reference[beast]{beast} that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Karkethzerethzerus's choice).

In a new form, Karkethzerethzerus retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and &Reference[int]{Intelligence}, &Reference[wis]{Wisdom}, and &Reference[cha]{Charisma} scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Karkethzerethzerus takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

  • Karkethzerethzerus creates fog as if it had cast the fog cloud spell. The fog lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round.
  • A blisteringly &Reference[cold]{cold} wind blows through the lair near Karkethzerethzerus. Each creature within 120 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 1d10 type=cold average=true]] damage. Gases and vapors are dispersed by the wind, and unprotected flames are extinguished. Protected flames, such as lanterns, have a 50 percent chance of being extinguished.
The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Regional Effects

The region containing Karkethzerethzerus’s lair is warped by the dragon’s magic, which creates one or more of the following effects.

  • Once per day, the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair. Karkethzerethzerus doesn’t need to be outdoors; otherwise the effect is identical to the control weather spell.
  • Within 1 mile of the lair, winds buoy non-evil creatures that fall due to no act of the dragon’s or its allies. Such creatures descend at a rate of 60 feet per round and take no falling damage.
  • Given days or longer to work, Karkethzerethzerus can make clouds and fog within its lair as solid as stone, forming structures and other objects as it wishes.

If Karkethzerethzerus dies, changed weather reverts to normal, as described in the spell, and the other effects fade in 1d10 days.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Karkethzerethzerus’s Lair

Strathfell, this &Reference[petrified]{petrified} woodland is the domain of an ancient silver shadow &Reference[dragon]{dragon} named Karkethzerethzerus, the Sable Despoiler (Karketh for short). Before his malign reign, this region of the Miskath Strand was a verdant haven for a long-lost nation of wood elves and centaurs. For reasons unknown, Karkethzerethzerus plotted to annihilate the woodland nation, killing it off with energies from the Shadowfell. Since doing exactly that, the Sable Despoiler has ruled Strathfell with equal measures of gleeful arrogance and baleful suspicion. The shadow dragon’s lair, like his motives, remain hidden.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Karkethzerethzerus can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Karkethzerethzerus regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Detect. Karkethzerethzerus makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

Tail Attack. Karkethzerethzerus makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions). Karkethzerethzerus beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of Karkethzerethzerus must succeed on a [[/save dex 25 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 10 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. Karkethzerethzerus can then fly up to half his flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Karkethzerethzerus makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Karkethzerethzerus beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of Karkethzerethzerus must succeed on a [[/save dex 25 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 10 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. Karkethzerethzerus can then fly up to half his flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day). If Karkethzerethzerus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Living Shadow. While in dim light or darkness, Karkethzerethzerus has resistance to damage that isn’t &Reference[force]{force}, &Reference[psychic]{psychic}, or &Reference[radiant]{radiant}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Shadow &Reference[ste]{Stealth}. While in dim light or darkness, Karkethzerethzerus can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, Karkethzerethzerus has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
